keyword: how many calories in chick fil a fries
title: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Fries?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Chick-fil-A fries for a medium serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for sizes.
h1: How Many Calories in Chick-fil-A Fries?
assumptions: Standard medium Waffle Potato Fries as served at Chick-fil-A; no added sauces or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, frying method, and customizations. Check Chick-fil-A app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A medium serving of Chick-fil-A waffle fries has 420 kcal and 24 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium Chick-fil-A fries?
faqs.a: 420 kcal for a standard medium serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Chick-fil-A fries?
faqs.a: 45 g carbs, including 5 g fiber, per medium serving.

faqs.q: Are Chick-fil-A fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 240 mg sodium per medium serving.

faqs.q: How does small vs. large Chick-fil-A fries compare in calories?
faqs.a: Small: ~320 kcal; large: ~520 kcal; medium: 420 kcal.
About 5 g protein per medium serving from potatoes.
